validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters

validation.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter

hero.description: A comprehensive digital educational ecosystem for Angola, connecting schools, parents, students, teachers, and school communities.

findSchool.title: Is Your School Already Here?
findSchool.subtitle: Search for your school and request access if it's not listed yet.

testimonials.title: What They Say About Us
testimonials.subtitle: Success stories from schools across Angola

newFeatures.title: Everything to Modernize
newFeatures.subtitle: State-of-the-art tools specifically designed for the Angolan educational context.

schoolManagement.title: Complete School Management
schoolManagement.desc: Manage enrollments, classes, schedules, and resources in one place. Automate processes and reduce administrative bureaucracy.

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.desc: Predictive performance analysis, at-risk student detection, and AI-based personalized study recommendations.
ai.deepDesc: We use attendance, grades, and participation data to identify patterns and help those in need.

mobile.title: Native Mobile App
mobile.desc: Full access via smartphone. Real-time notifications, integrated chat, and offline functionality.
mobile.syncDesc: Work without internet. Data syncs automatically once connection is restored.

multilingual.title: Multilingual
multilingual.desc: Full support for Portuguese, English, French, and Turkish. Ideal for international schools.

security.title: Advanced Security
security.desc: Enterprise-level data protection with encryption, automatic backups, and LGPD compliance.

analytics.title: Analytics & Reports
analytics.desc: Real-time dashboards, custom reports, and actionable insights for informed decisions.

portalsSection.title: One Portal for
portalsSection.subtitle: Personalized experiences for students, teachers, parents, and school administration.

portals.title: Access Your Portal
portals.subtitle: Choose the portal that matches your role

student.title: Student Portal
student.description: Access grades, schedules, digital library, and study materials. Track your academic progress.

teacher.title: Teacher Portal
teacher.description: Manage classes, enter grades, create assessments, and communicate with parents efficiently.

parent.title: Parent Portal
parent.description: Track your children's performance, communicate with the school, and receive important notifications.

school.title: School Portal
school.description: Complete administration: enrollments, finances, human resources, and institutional reports.

ministry.title: Ministry Dashboard
ministry.description: National overview and education system statistics

cta.title: Ready to Transform
cta.description: Join hundreds of institutions already revolutionizing education in Angola with Ulongo.

footer.tagline: Transforming education in Angola through technology and innovation.
